EmailTemplate.name: Tottenham Football Club Payment
EmailTemplate.subject: Tottenham Football Club Payment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
Following the information that was sent out last week about the Tottenham football camp, please let us remind you that you do NOT need to bring the money with the sign up form. We will contact you about the payment after the May break.
For the moment we are collecting sign up forms only.
Thank you and best regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Tel: +7 (916) 922 04 54 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group World Class Education
